title: 1.8 3d材质制作问题
author: MC.cdasc
txt_content:
MC启动到Mojang画面后崩溃
工具 opl's Model Creator v1.2.1

错误信息---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!

Time: 15-9-19 下午8:52
Description: Generating mipmaps for frame

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4
        at bml.a(SourceFile:78)
        at bmi.d(SourceFile:284)
        at bmh.b(SourceFile:159)

        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(SourceFile:122)

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content: 设置里面关闭mipmaps，mipmapLevels设置为0试试，一般设置后不会崩溃，但是失效和错误的材质包的部分不会显示

replies.author: MC.cdasc
replies.txt_content:
jiongjionger 发表于 2015-9-23 17:25
设置里面关闭mipmaps，mipmapLevels设置为0试试，一般设置后不会崩溃，但是失效和错误的材质包的部分不会显 ...
问题是现在进不去MC
而且五边形的3D材质打开正常

replies.author: MC.cdasc
